author: Socrates Mbamalu, Harry Cheadle
title: Lack of Water in Parts of Africa Will Be a Huge Problem if Coronavirus Hits
description: Many people in Nigeria, Sierra Leone and other countries don't have the means to wash their hands as frequently as public health experts advise.
content: I met Ismail Adewale carrying two buckets of water, which he bought for 10 naira (about a quarter of a cent each) from a community water source in Lagos, Nigeria, where he lives. He was with two other friends on this daily chore, picking up water that's used … [+4017 chars]
